Empire of Japan.Name: I-179
Empire of Japan.Fate: Sunk during sea trials, 14 July 1943 | Salvaged and scrapped, 1957

General characteristics.Displacement: 1,862 t (1,833 long tons) (surfaced) | 2,644 t (2,602 long tons) (submerged)
General characteristics.Speed: 23 knots (43 km/h; 26 mph) surfaced | 8 knots (15 km/h; 9.2 mph) submerged
General characteristics.Range: 8,000 nmi (15,000 km; 9,200 mi) at 16 knots (30 km/h; 18 mph) surfaced | 50 nmi (93 km; 58 mi) at 5 knots (9.3 km/h; 5.8 mph) submerged
General characteristics.Armament: 6 × 533 mm (21 in) torpedo tubes (all bow) | 1 × 120 mm (4.7 in) deck gun | 1 × twin 25 mm (1.0 in) Type 96 AA gun
